abstract: Kanye West will perform one-time-only concert of his influential 2008 album 808s & Heartbreak at Hollywood Bowl on Sept 25.
lead_paragraph: Mr. West will perform a one-off concert celebrating his 2008 album, “808s & Heartbreak,” at the Hollywood Bowl next month.

headline.main: Kanye West to Perform an ‘808s’ Concert
headline.print_headline: Kanye West to Perform an ‘808s’ Concert

snippet: Mr. West will perform a one-off concert celebrating his 2008 album, “808s & Heartbreak,” at the Hollywood Bowl next month.
